attachments.title: Pebble Is Dead, and Its Customers Are Completely Screwed
attachments.text: Pebble, one of the best-known smartwatch brands, is dead. Rumors about the company’s demise have been swirling since The Information reported a potential Fitbit buyout last week. Today in a post on Kickstarter, Pebble confirmed that Fitbit was acquiring “key Pebble assets” and that Pebble would “no longer be operating as in independent company.”
attachments.fallback: Gizmodo: Pebble Is Dead, and Its Customers Are Completely Screwed

text: Just rub it in Miguel's face
I only have $40 total invested from my craigslist watch. I was just really a fan of their design choices.
